docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: As the serious and possibly life-threatening effects of body-building steroids become better known, specialists are increasingly alarmed about the growing use of these drugs by college and high school athletes and by teen-age boys who want an athlete's body without the work.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Federal health officials today announced approval for wider use of an experimental drug to treat AIDS patients who suffer from a life-threatening form of pneumonia.

headline.main: Wider Use of Experimental Drug For AIDS Ailment Is Approved

docs.snippet: LEAD: Federal health officials today announced approval for wider use of an experimental drug to treat AIDS patients who suffer from a life-threatening form of pneumonia.

byline.original: By PHILIP M. BOFFEY, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Bleak results from recent experiments indicate that the quest for a vaccine against AIDS will be even more difficult than many experts had imagined. The results also raise the possibility that current lines of vaccine research may be fruitless.

headline.main: Recent Setbacks Stirring Doubts About Search for AIDS Vaccine

docs.snippet: LEAD: Bleak results from recent experiments indicate that the quest for a vaccine against AIDS will be even more difficult than many experts had imagined. The results also raise the possibility that current lines of vaccine research may be fruitless.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A NEW generation of drugs to treat depression is giving medical scientists a fresh view of the best strategies for coping with this severe and widespread mental disorder and important clues to its nature.

headline.main: Depression: Studies Bring New Drugs And Insights

docs.snippet: LEAD: A NEW generation of drugs to treat depression is giving medical scientists a fresh view of the best strategies for coping with this severe and widespread mental disorder and important clues to its nature.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: After a sluggish start that provoked criticism and bitter disputes, Federal and private efforts to develop new drug treatments for AIDS are accelerating.

headline.main: CAMPAIGN TO FIND DRUGS FOR FIGHTING AIDS IS INTENSIFIED

docs.snippet: LEAD: After a sluggish start that provoked criticism and bitter disputes, Federal and private efforts to develop new drug treatments for AIDS are accelerating.

byline.original: By PHILIP M. BOFFEY, Special to the New York Times
